Text.Page:
,

Come see me when you can. I have a challenge only a skilled warrior such as yourself can meet.

-Coldren-(Close letter)

Welcome, welcome!

I hope my letter found you at a good time.You mentioned a challenge?

Indeed I did. As a fellow warrior, I know how exhilirating it is facing off against powerful foes. So I'm looking for people willing to take on the biggest challenges facing the Valkyon Federation right now.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>I'm listening.</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Trainers like myself are gathering the best of the best, hoping to observe them in action and possibly learn new tricks from former students.

Does that sound interesting to you?Well, I am the best...

Excellent! I knew we'd picked the right person. There are five challenges to master, each requiring you to defeat powerful enemies.

Tell me when you're ready to begin.Let's do this!
Great work, as expected. You're definitley among the finest warriors in the federation.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>What's next?</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
